channel.title: How i add command
channel.description:
hi i use frostiescape source, but i wanna know how to add a command
I wanna know:
How i make it,where i make it wich file, What i type or a code, and where in the love =]

item.title: How i add command
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Under the customCommand() method add:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("command")) { doAction1(); sendMessage("message"); etc(); }

Read full topic

item.title: How i add command
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

[quote=“Mr. Despair, post:5, topic:339655”][quote author=demonlover14 link=topic=436033.msg3203064#msg3203064 date=1273518954]
He’s asking how to make it, what file to use, and what code.
For the first part, I have some tutorials on commands on my website.
Second of all it belongs in client.java under something like this, “CustomCommands” if you do not already have atlest 1 command.
Making commands is one of the easyest and funnist things to do.
Theirs many types of command you can make.
You can open shops with a command.
Open a interface with just a command.
Teleport you somewhere.
Make it tell people something when you use the command.
And so much more fun:)
[/quote]

Adding onto what he said. Under customCommand, you could make a tele command or along those lines, for instance:

if (command.startsWith("tele") && playerRights >= 2) { toX = 19; toY = 19;[/quote]
I have like 3 differnert tutorials explained with great detail on how to make commands:)

Read full topic

item.title: How i add command
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

He’s asking how to make it, what file to use, and what code.
For the first part, I have some tutorials on commands on my website.
Second of all it belongs in client.java under something like this, “CustomCommands” if you do not already have atlest 1 command.
Making commands is one of the easyest and funnist things to do.
Theirs many types of command you can make.
You can open shops with a command.
Open a interface with just a command.
Teleport you somewhere.
Make it tell people something when you use the command.
And so much more fun:)

item.title: How i add command
item.dc:creator: @_J_ava [J]ava
item.description:
@_J_ava wrote:

IpeekayI:

Client.java use a commandmaker.bat or something,try using one of zodiacs packages.

Ethier do that or look for anyother command in Client.java and just look at that, then write one below it.

Read full topic
